com.gocardless.pro.services

Class SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.pro.http.PostRequest<Subscription>
      • com.gocardless.pro.services.SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    SubscriptionService

    public static final class SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest
extends PostRequest<Subscription>

    Request class for SubscriptionService.create().

    Creates a new subscription object

    • Method Detail

      • withAmount

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withAmount(Integer amount)

        Amount in pence or cents.

      • withCount

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withCount(Integer count)

        An alternative way to set end_at. The total number of payments that should be taken by this subscription. This will set end_at automatically.

      • withCurrency

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withCurrency(String currency)

        ISO 4217 currency code. Currently only GBP and EUR are supported.

      • withDayOfMonth

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withDayOfMonth(Integer dayOfMonth)

        As per RFC 2445. The day of the month to charge customers on. 1-28 or -1 to indicate the last day of the month

      • withEndAt

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withEndAt(String endAt)

        Date after which no further payments should be charged. If a payment falls on this date, it will not be charged. If blank, the subscription will continue forever. Alternatively, count can be set to achieve a specific number of payments.

      • withInterval

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withInterval(Integer interval)

        Number of interval_units between customer charge dates. Must result in at least one charge date per year. Defaults to 1.

      • withIntervalUnit

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withIntervalUnit(String intervalUnit)

        The unit of time between customer charge dates. One of weekly, monthly or yearly.

      • withLinks

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withLinks(SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest.Links links)

      • withMetadata

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withMetadata(Map<String,String> metadata)

        Key-value store of custom data. Up to 3 keys are permitted, with key names up to 50 characters and values up to 200 characters.

      • withMonth

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withMonth(SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest.Month month)

        Name of the month on which to charge a customer. Must be lowercase.

      • withName

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withName(String name)

        Optional name for the subscription. This field must not exceed 255 characters.

      • withStartAt

        public SubscriptionService.SubscriptionCreateRequest withStartAt(String startAt)

        The date on which the first payment should be charged. Must be within one year of creation and on or after the mandate’s next_possible_charge_date. When blank, this will be set as the mandate’s next_possible_charge_date.

      • execute

        public T execute()
        Executes this request.
        Returns:
        the API response.
        Throws:
        GoCardlessException
